overview:
Mr. White joined Salem Capital in 2003 with the primary responsibility of covering the greater Atlanta, Georgia, and Southeast markets. Prior to joining SCP, Mr. White spent seven years with SunTrust Bank, the last four with SunTrust Equity Partners (“STEP”) where he was a Vice President.

Prior to joining STEP, Mr. White spent two years in SunTrust’s New York office. Mr. White began his career at SunTrust as an analyst on the commercial banking training program in 1996. Prior to joining SunTrust, Mr. White worked in the finance department of an Atlanta based apartment investment and management firm, valuing potential real estate investments.

Mr. White earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration from The Citadel and an MBA from the Babcock Graduate School of Management at Wake Forest University.

E-mail: swhite@salemcapital.com
